A general feedback on dcs service. Received bill with charge for card renewal. Paid my outstanding dues and WhatsApp their number to cancel card. No response. Call their customer service. Got in third time and told them I want to cancel card. After one month  still got bill with late interest charge. So for those want to cancel dcs card  you may need to be persistent in getting them to cancel the card.
Persistent to cancel card... that seems so wrong.. seems they are so hard up to hang onto customers...
